Trade/Device Name(s): VITROS Immunodiagnostic Products Intact PTH II Reagent Pack
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for VITROS Immunodiagnostic Products Intact PTH II Reagent Pack, an immunoassay for quantitative measurement of intact parathyroid hormone in serum and plasma using VITROS 3600 platform
Indications for Use Summary: Quantitative measurement of intact parathyroid hormone (iPTH) in human serum and plasma to aid in diagnosis of hyperparathyroidism, hypoparathyroidism, differential diagnosis of hypocalcemia or hypercalcemia, and for intraoperative measurement of iPTH levels.
